ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: French advanced grammar and reading, speaking, ans writing
This course greatly improved my french speaking, reading and comprehension skills.
I really improved my french skills in this course orally, grammatically, and written. I became a lot more comfortable speaking and much more confident writing.
Better spoken French, grammar and vocabulary
Stronger understanding of French grammar, conversational skills.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: My French improved tremendously, especially my written and oral pronunciation.

The strength of this course is that you get to speak a lot of French with your classmates and learn how to communicate abstract thoughts in French. I think that this course could be improved by increasing smaller writing assignments and also more grammar correction as we speak in class.

The strengths were the materials selected. I really enjoyed the selected readings and movies. I thought they were very interesting and also quite beneficial. Weaknesses would be that the grammar moved at a very fast pace although I understand that less time was supposed to be dedicated to grammar in this upper level course, however, it felt necessary at least to me for my progress to review it.
Good course, great texts, could have better explanations of grammar in the course pack

Strengths: well-organized, clear expectations 

Weaknesses: significant workload

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: If you want to learn French or get a certificate this is a great course
Yes, this course is great for anyone who wants to improve communicating in French.
I would! I improved my French a lot and think it will be a necessary stepping stone in my French journey.
Yes, important French while learning important texts
Yes  I feel like this course significantly improved my French ability, more so than any high school or college French course Ive taken.
